mean_cn: n. 匿名，作者不明（或不详），无名之辈
mean_en: the state of remaining unknown to most other people; the state of not having any unusual or interesting features
sentence: He agreed to be interviewed, so long as his anonymity was assured.
sentence_trans: 只要能保证匿名，他就同意接受采访。
word_etyma: anonym无名氏 + ity名词后缀 → anonymity无名，匿名
